formattedAddress: 327 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 327 W 11th St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I had been looking forward to my first facial at Savor Beauty and it did not disappoint (Erika is awesome!)! Everything from the staff working the front to my aesthetician coming out to greet me, to the explaining of the deliciousness I was about to experience, as well as the experience of buying the amazing products they have was like being back with great friends, lovely women supportive of other women. The personalized and no rush service that I received, as well as how my face looked and felt (and still looks/feels like) was so satisfying, just what I needed. I would definitely recommend SB for your next facial! Try out their products too which are quality (the owners skin is proof that skin health is beautiful, wow!). Thank you, Savor Beauty!

originalText.text: If you have sensitive skin, this is the place to go for facials!! The products are heavenly and effective. Not only is my skin very reactive but I also have gotten migraines from chemicals in beauty products so it's imperative for me to find places like Savor Beauty & Spa to be able to pamper and nourish myself without those awful side effects.

text.text: If you have sensitive skin, this is the place to go for facials!! The products are heavenly and effective. Not only is my skin very reactive but I also have gotten migraines from chemicals in beauty products so it's imperative for me to find places like Savor Beauty & Spa to be able to pamper and nourish myself without those awful side effects.

originalText.text:
Rejuvenating and relaxing.
I have been facials at Savor Beauty for over three years now, and I have to do them at least once a month now as I do love them and they help me rejuvenate and relax.

It helps me get rid of the daily NYC toxins builds up plus it’s my one hour disconnect from this world into another world of pampering with love and relaxation.

The staff and place are amazing, I love and have been using the products for over 4 years now, my routine is 2, 2.5, 3 (glow) then 4 which I use every morning after shower and it takes me 45 seconds only. Highly recommended - try it if you don’t believe me. Thank you all

originalText.text: Favorite skincare! I've been using Savor products since 2020 and my skin is smoother and more moisturized than ever. I live in Georgia but make time to visit the store and get a facial when I visit. The seasonal specials are a treat!

text.text: Favorite skincare! I've been using Savor products since 2020 and my skin is smoother and more moisturized than ever. I live in Georgia but make time to visit the store and get a facial when I visit. The seasonal specials are a treat!

originalText.text: Visit Savor Beauty and get a facial! From the moment I stepped foot in the door till I left, I was treated with nothing but kindness and professionalism. I loved the smell of fruits to floral scents in the products and the treatments from the microdermabrasion, enzyme peel, and microcurrent that Ivy, the esthetician at the West Village location, used on my face. Simply incredible! Ivy was such a joy to be around. She was very professional in our interactions, telling me exactly what she would perform and what she thought I should do for self-care post-facial. After getting a facial from her, I felt terrific (!!). What she used on my face felt amazing and smelled delicious. After the facial, my skin felt smooth, supple, and lovely. Another facial from Ivy is definitely in my calendar. Don't wait too long! She books out in advance.=D
